abstract: Meg Whitman announced that Hewlett-Packard would retain its PC division, citing “a lot of opportunity.”
snippet: Meg Whitman announced that Hewlett-Packard would retain its PC division, citing “a lot of opportunity.”
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — Meg Whitman is moving as fast as she can to figure out a strategy for Hewlett-Packard. For starters, she wants to keep selling personal computers.

headline.main: In a Switch, H.P. Chief Will Keep the PC Group
headline.print_headline: In a Switch, H.P. Chief Will Keep the PC Group
